sys_ux_client_script.name: Generate query and title

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_af6518954733021004d3fe02d16d43ca
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Home">5fd11afb1b818d10b81fdce7cc4bcb15</macroponent><name>Generate query and title</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) 
{
    var cspListQuery = api.state.listQuery;
    var cspListTitle = api.state.listTitle;

    var cspListQueryArray = cspListQuery.split('^u_request_type=');

    var cspListTitleArray = cspListTitle.split(' - ');

    var passedQuery = event.payload.heListQuery;
    var passedTitle = event.payload.heListTitle;

    if (passedQuery == 'legal' || passedQuery == 'facilities' || passedQuery == 'hr')
    {
        api.setState('listQuery', cspListQuery[0] + '^u_request_type=' + passedQuery);
        api.setState('listTitle', cspListTitleArray[0] + ' - ' + passedQuery);
    }
    else if(passedQuery = "all")
    {
        api.setState('listQuery', cspListQueryArray[0]);
        api.setState('listTitle', cspListTitleArray[0]);
    }
    else
    {
        api.setState('listQuery', passedQuery);
        api.setState('listTitle', passedTitle);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-02 13:45:40</sys_created_on><sys_id>af6518954733021004d3fe02d16d43ca</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Generate query and title</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_af6518954733021004d3fe02d16d43ca</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-08-02 13:45:40</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
